sn8.11:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā campāyaṁ vihārati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sattahi ca upāsakasatehi sattahi ca upāsikāsatehi anekehi ca devatāsahassehi. Tyāssudaṁ bhagavā atirocati vaṇṇena ceva yasasā ca.
sn8.11:2: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "paṭibhāti maṁ, bhagavā, paṭibhāti maṁ, sugatā"ti.
sn8.11:3: "Cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabhe,Virocati vigatamalova bhāṇumā;Evampi aṅgīrasa tvaṁ mahāmuni,Atirocasi yasasā sabbalokan"ti.
